function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hospitalized patients with biologically confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19 or suggestive CT scan","Impact":"Risk of contagious disease spread in the hospital environment","Mitigation":"Isolation of infected patients, strict infection control measures","Technologies":"Negative pressure rooms, air filtration systems","People":"Hospitalized patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital administration, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Standardizing hospitalization data using population size","Impact":"Potential misrepresentation of epidemic magnitude","Mitigation":"Use of additional metrics to complement standardized data","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, epidemiological modeling","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health agencies, researchers"},{"Description":"Non-pharmaceutical interventions implemented during the epidemic","Impact":"Effectiveness of interventions in reducing disease spread","Mitigation":"Continuous evaluation and adjustment of NPIs based on epidemiological data","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance systems, data analysis tools","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies"}]}
